binding:binding.name: DWD Weather Forecast Binding
binding:binding.description: This is the binding for the Deutsche Wetterdienst (DWD) Weather Forecast. The data is provided on the DWD opendata web site: https://opendata.dwd.de. All information provided by the DWD is protected by copyright. Find the terms of use under: https://www.dwd.de/copyright.
binding:binding.author: Lars Ottawa
